description: A widget with a drop-down list of items to choose from.

change:selectionIndex.description: Fired when the selectionIndex property changes.

change:selection.description: Fired when the selection property changes. The index of the selected item is given in the options object as `index`.

select.description: Fired an item was selected by the user. Parameters are the same as in `change:selection`, i.e. `widget`, `selection`, `options`.
